channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AMD unveils new AI PC processors for general use and gaming at CES
item.description: AMD announced the latest version of its AI-powered PC chips designed for a variety of tasks from gaming to content creation and multitasking.

item.title: CES Live Blog, Day 2: More of the Coolest Tech From Las Vegas
item.description: Read our live updates from CES 2026 to see the latest consumer gadgetry in all of its chatbot-enabled, sensor-packed, AI-infused glory.

item.title: Narwal adds AI to its vacuum cleaners to monitor pets and find jewelry
item.description: Narwal's new robo vacuum cleaner switches to quiet mode near a baby's crib.

item.title: 6 Best Gym Bags for Every Workout and Commute (2026)
item.description: New year, new gym bag. I put over 20 models to the test in 2025 so you can start 2026 with the best.

item.title: The Best Ventless Fireplaces for Cozy Vibes (2026)
item.description: No chimney? No problem. LED and gel fuel fireplaces are excellent alternatives for those who can’t or don’t want to burn wood. We tried one of each to...

item.title: Meta pauses international expansion of its Ray-Ban Display glasses
item.description: Meta had originally planned to launch the glasses in France, Italy, Canada, and the U.K. in early 2026.

item.title: Amazon’s Ring doorbells get fire alerts, an app store and new sensors
item.description: The new Ring Sensors can detect motion, openings, glass breakage, and smoke, and can also monitor carbon monoxide levels, leaks, temperature changes, ...

item.title: The 3 Keys to Understanding Trump’s Retro Coup in Venezuela
item.description: This weekend’s invasion was both a throwback to the last century and a new, uniquely Trumpian nightmare—one that’s just beginning.

item.title: 13 Best Tablets (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We’ve tested all the top slates, from Apple’s iPads to Android and Windows devices, and rounded up our favorites.

item.title: Insight Partners sued by former vice president Kate Lowry
item.description: Insight Partners sued by former vice president Kate Lowry.
